import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const Products = () => { const categories = useSelector((state) => state.categories.categories); const products = useSelector((state) => state.products.products); const [isShowPopupAdd, setIsShowPopupAdd] = useState(false); const hanleTogglePopupAdd = (e) => { isShowPopupAdd ? setIsShowPopupAdd(false) : setIsShowPopupAdd(true); }; return ( <>

{products.map((product) => ( ))}

#{product.id}

Giá: {product.priceProduct} Lượt xem: {product.priceProduct}

{product.nameProduct} {prod} {/* {product.descriptionProduct || "Chưa có mô tả."} */} Edit {" "} /{" "} Xóa
{ e.stopPropagation(); }} >

); }; export default Products;
